story.text: We are proposing running a [[Livecode Dojo]] from February till Thursday 22nd April 2021. We will work around a series of small Livecode applications created for mobile, tablet and desktop that interface with each other using the [[experience api]] ([[xAPI]]).
There will be once a week live video conferencing with recordings made for those that can't make it.

xAPI Learning Meet
DATE Thursday
TIME 14:00
FOR 60 minutes
IN EST

HERE

# Teams
We form teams around project ideas that we work on. A team need not involve only coders. We can alos develop course content, or research elements that the project needs to develop.

# Teams
We form teams around project ideas that we work on. A team need not involve only coders. We can alos develop course content, or research elements that the project needs to develop.
